no-devtool-in-prod

Why is this important?

The ‘devtool’ property significantly increases the size of your JavaScript bundles.

What does the rule check?

This checks if you are using the proper ‘devtool’ property for production webpack builds.

Example that trigger the rule

Examples that pass the rule

Further Reading

  • Webpack Documentation
  • devtool property docs
